"Phantom Class Aptitude Test IV":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Phantom class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
This quest is for those who desire further
improvement of their skills and abilities.
※Phantom class only. Lv.61+ enemies.
Defeat [Vardha Soma] using a Katana
Defeat [Biol Meduna] using a Rifle
Defeat [Gwanahda] using a Rod
※Phantom's level cap increases to 100."

"Phantom Level Cap License IV~V
Advanced Phantom License I"
